name: Absolution, Epic Mega Jam 2020
description:
Plot

"Mate I don't  even know how to  say this...  but you are the most evil yet not evil at all creature I have met here at the depths, I'm not sure if it's admiration or pity what I'm currently feeling  for you. 

Well I'm kinda busy so let's make this brief, all beings that end up in this comfy abyss of darkness and perdition, are considered the evilest of the evilest, even a thousand years of torture isn't considered an optimal punishment for their sins and misdeeds. so they get registered for the absolution games,  in which they must earn their absolution no matter how long they take or  what it takes.

Probably by now you have already realized that you will be part of this event, in fact you  are  the main event.  And well that's all the time we've got mate, so good luck and hope you enjoy your time here, after all,  only few beings get to see this  place ,  although there are less who leave it".

Gameplay

WASD - Movement

E- Pick up box

Space Bar - Jump

Mouse - Camera Movement

Esc - Pause Menu

Non Original Assets

Megascans - Boxes and black sand

Artlist.io - Sound Effects

Montserrat Font by Julieta Ulanovsky

Break Font by Rajesh Rajput

Used Tools

Houdini Indie - Terrain, box generation and early particles for Niagara

Ableton Live - Music

Blender  - Early mesh modelling
